channel.title: [HELP] How To Add Items in Shop [HELP]
channel.description:
First I would To say I am not english But Dutch
So Sorry for my bad english
I am New
I would like To know How i add items in a shop
Some one plz help me
Greetz Me

item.title: [HELP] How To Add Items in Shop [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

shops.cfg

choose the sgop you want, press tab, then add the ID of the item, press tab again, put 100 or 1000 ( the number of items in the shop, and press tab again, save.

Read full topic
